verses.verse: Shiggaion of David, which he sang unto Jehovah, concerning the words of Cush a Benjamite. O Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>, in thee do I take refuge <WH2620>: Save <WH3467> me from all them that pursue <WH7291> me <WH5337>, and deliver me,
Lest they tear <WH2963> my soul <WH5315> like a lion <WH738>, Rending it in pieces <WH6561>, while there is none to deliver <WH5337>.
O Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430>, if I have done <WH6213> this <WH3426>; If there be iniquity <WH5766> in my hands <WH3709>;
If I have rewarded <WH1580> evil <WH7451> unto him that was at peace <WH7999> with me <WH2502>; (Yea, I have delivered him that without cause <WH7387> was mine adversary <WH6887>;)

Let the enemy <WH341> pursue <WH7291> my soul <WH5315>, and overtake <WH5381> it <WH2416>; Yea, let him tread my life down <WH7429> to the earth <WH776>, And lay <WH7931> my glory <WH3519> in the dust <WH6083>. <WH5542>[[Selah

Arise <WH6965>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, in thine anger <WH639>; Lift up <WH5375> thyself against the rage <WH5678> of mine adversaries <WH6887>, And awake <WH5782> for me <WH6680>; thou hast commanded judgment <WH4941>.
And let the congregation <WH5712> of the peoples <WH3816> compass thee about <WH5437>; And over them return <WH7725> thou on high <WH4791>.
Jehovah <WH3068> ministereth judgment <WH1777> to the peoples <WH5971>: Judge <WH8199> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, according to my righteousness <WH6664>, and to mine integrity that is in me <WH8537>.

O let the wickedness <WH7451> of the wicked <WH7563> come to an end <WH1584>, but establish <WH3559> thou the righteous <WH6662>: For the righteous <WH6662> God <WH430> trieth <WH974> the minds <WH3629> and hearts <WH3826>.
My shield <WH4043> is with God <WH430>, Who saveth <WH3467> the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820>.
God <WH430> is a righteous <WH6662> judge <WH8199>, Yea <WH410>, a God that hath indignation <WH2194> every day <WH3117>.
If a man turn <WH7725> not <WH3913>, he will whet his sword <WH2719>; He hath bent <WH1869> his bow <WH7198>, and made it ready <WH3559>.
He hath also prepared <WH3559> for him the instruments <WH3627> of death <WH4194>; He maketh <WH6466> his arrows <WH2671> fiery shafts <WH1814>.
Behold <WH2254>, he travaileth with iniquity <WH205>; Yea <WH2029>, he hath conceived mischief <WH5999>, and brought forth <WH3205> falsehood <WH8267>.
He hath made <WH3738> a pit <WH953>, and digged <WH2658> it <WH5307>, And is fallen into the ditch <WH7845> which he made <WH6466>.
His mischief <WH5999> shall return <WH7725> upon his own head <WH7218>, And his violence <WH2555> shall come down <WH3381> upon his own pate <WH6936>.
I will give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068> according to his righteousness <WH6664>, And will sing praise <WH2167> to the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068> Most High <WH5945>.
